    • Constructor Detail

      • Goal

        public Goal(Station startStation,
            Station finalStation,
            int noOfStations,
            java.lang.String cargo,
            int reward)
        Initializes the goal.
        Parameters:
        startStation - The Station the goal starts from
        finalStation - The Station the goal ends at
        noOfStations - The maximum number of station the train should pass. Value 0 means there is no time constraint.
        cargo - The type of cargo the train is carrying. (Currently not used)
        reward - The reward (currently Gold) you get for completing the Goal

        Returns:

      • incrementCurrentGoalDuration

        public void incrementCurrentGoalDuration()
        Should be called at the end of each turn

      • calculatePoints

        public int calculatePoints()
        Used to calculate how many points to add to a player's score upon completion of goal EstimateOptimalDuration = how many turns it would take train to travel goal's optimal route at base speed CurrentGoalDuration = how many turns it actually took the train reward = length of optimal journey
        Returns:
        0 if goal is not yet completed, otherwise number of points

      • estimateOptimalDuration

        public int estimateOptimalDuration()
        Used to estimate how many turns it would take the train (assigned to the goal) to travel the goal's optimal route at its base speed
        Returns:
        0 if no train has been assigned, otherwise it will return "optimal" number of turns for completion

      • isQuantifiable

        public boolean isQuantifiable()

      • isAbsolute

        public boolean isAbsolute()

      • getTimeConstraintString

        public java.lang.String getTimeConstraintString()
        Returns the number of stations a player ha to pass through. Returns "Any" if StationVia is null.
        Returns:
        The route string that is displayed on the ticket ("via n stations" if quantifiable, or "Any" if absolute)

      • getTimeConstraint

        public int getTimeConstraint()

        public void setTimeConstraint(int timeConstraint)
